targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        i.region_name AS region,
        COUNT(i.id) AS total,
        gd.latitude AS lat,
        gd.longitude AS lon,
        gd.city AS city
FROM aws_orphan_instance AS i
INNER JOIN aws_geodata AS gd ON i.region_name = gd.region_name
WHERE i.state = 'running' AND i.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY (i.region_name, gd.city, gd.latitude, gd.longitude);

SELECT
        v.region_name AS region,
        COUNT(v.id) AS total,
        gd.latitude AS lat,
        gd.longitude AS lon,
        gd.city AS city
FROM aws_orphan_vpc AS v
INNER JOIN aws_geodata AS gd ON v.region_name = gd.region_name
WHERE v.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY (v.region_name, gd.city, gd.latitude, gd.longitude);

SELECT
        b.region_name AS region,
        COUNT(b.id) AS total,
        gd.latitude AS lat,
        gd.longitude AS lon,
        gd.city AS city
FROM aws_orphan_bucket AS b
INNER JOIN aws_geodata AS gd ON b.region_name = gd.region_name
WHERE b.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY (b.region_name, gd.city, gd.latitude, gd.longitude)

SELECT DISTINCT
       i.region_name AS region,
       COUNT(i.id) AS total,
       gd.latitude AS lat,
       gd.longitude AS lon,
       gd.city AS city
FROM aws_instance AS i
INNER JOIN aws_geodata AS gd ON i.region_name = gd.region_name
INNER JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
INNER JOIN g_shoot AS s ON m.namespace = s.technical_id
LEFT JOIN g_cloud_profile_aws_image AS cpaw ON s.cloud_profile = cpaw.cloud_profile_name AND i.image_id = cpaw.ami
WHERE i.account_id IN ($aws_account) AND cpaw.ami IS NULL
GROUP BY (i.region_name, gd.city, gd.latitude, gd.longitude)

SELECT
        i.region_name AS region,
        COUNT(i.name) AS total,
        gd.latitude AS lat,
        gd.longitude AS lon,
        gd.city AS city
FROM aws_instance AS i
INNER JOIN aws_geodata AS gd ON i.region_name = gd.region_name
WHERE i.launch_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '180 days' AND i.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY (i.region_name, gd.city, gd.latitude, gd.longitude);

SELECT COUNT(i.id) AS total FROM aws_orphan_instance AS i
WHERE i.account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        COUNT(i.name) AS total
FROM aws_instance AS i
WHERE launch_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '180 days' AND account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.description: Unknown images which are not defined in the respective CloudProfile

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(i.id)
FROM aws_instance AS i
INNER JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
INNER JOIN g_shoot AS s ON m.namespace = s.technical_id
LEFT JOIN g_cloud_profile_aws_image AS cpaw ON s.cloud_profile = cpaw.cloud_profile_name AND i.image_id = cpaw.ami
WHERE cpaw.ami IS NULL AND i.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.title: Unknown EC2 Instance Images

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        i.name AS instance_name,
        i.instance_id AS instance_id,
        i.instance_type AS type,
        i.state AS state,
        i.account_id AS account_id,

        v.name AS vpc_name,
        v.vpc_id AS vpc_id,
        v.region_name AS region,

        s.name AS shoot,
        s.project_name AS project
FROM aws_instance AS i
LEFT JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
LEFT JOIN aws_vpc AS v ON i.vpc_id = v.vpc_id
LEFT JOIN g_shoot AS s ON v.name = s.technical_id
WHERE i.launch_time < NOW() - INTERVAL '180 days' AND i.account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT DISTINCT
       i.*,
       s.name AS shoot_name,
       s.project_name AS project_name
FROM aws_instance AS i
INNER JOIN g_machine AS m ON i.name = m.name
INNER JOIN g_shoot AS s ON m.namespace = s.technical_id
LEFT JOIN g_cloud_profile_aws_image AS cpaw ON s.cloud_profile = cpaw.cloud_profile_name AND i.image_id = cpaw.ami
WHERE cpaw.ami IS NULL AND i.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.title: List of Unknown EC2 Instance Images

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(b.name)
FROM aws_bucket AS b
LEFT JOIN g_backup_bucket AS gbb ON b.name = gbb.name
WHERE gbb.name IS NULL AND account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT b.*
FROM aws_bucket AS b
LEFT JOIN g_backup_bucket AS gbb ON b.name = gbb.name
WHERE gbb.name IS NULL AND account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        COUNT(v.name) AS total
FROM aws_orphan_vpc AS v
WHERE v.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.description: Subnets which are part of a leaked VPC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        COUNT(*) AS total
FROM aws_orphan_subnet AS s
WHERE s.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.title: Number of Leaked AWS Subnets

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        v.*
FROM aws_vpc AS v
LEFT JOIN g_shoot AS s ON v.name = s.technical_id
WHERE s.technical_id is NULL AND account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.description: Subnets which belong to VPCs that have been identified as leaked

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        s.*
FROM aws_subnet AS s
INNER JOIN aws_vpc AS v ON s.vpc_id = v.vpc_id AND s.account_id = v.account_id
LEFT JOIN g_shoot AS gs ON v.name = gs.technical_id
WHERE gs.technical_id IS NULL AND s.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.title: Leaked AWS Subnets

panels.description: DHCP option sets which aren't bound to a VPC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        dos.*
FROM aws_orphan_dhcp_option_set AS dos
WHERE dos.account_id IN ($aws_account);

panels.title: Leaked AWS DHCP option sets
